name: Benoit Tigeot
body:
### Benoit Tigeot : Home sweet home

I'm a **young developer**, **experienced sound designer** who worked in video games and tv/animations industries.

I'm **passionate about coding** specially **tools**, **bots**, **sounds related software**. I like to contribute to other projects, hacker's community, and hard thinking about coding concepts.

Here is few project I contribute :

* [Irc logger written in ruby, with Cinch, MongoDB, Sinatra, D3js](https://github.com/benoittgt/revue)
* [Dirty ruby irc log bot with Cinch, Sinatra and boostrap](https://github.com/benoittgt/cinchlogsinat) 
* [Gazouilleur by Regard Citoyen](https://github.com/RouxRC/gazouilleur)
* [Rails project : Acacias](https://github.com/benoittgt/acacias-harvest)
* [Nice text message bot](https://github.com/N3bTcx/Gammu_RssTail) for a friend who love football. 
* [And many more..](https://github.com/benoittgt)

### Config files

Check my [dotfiles](https://github.com/benoittgt/dotfiles) use them, fork them, etc. I love using debian+i3wm, vim/gvim, tmux, irssi...

### Contact

* benoit at strapontin dot me (PGP: **9FFF5B74**)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/benoit_tgt)
* [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/benoittigeot)
* [Audio blog](http://benoit.tigeot.sounddesigners.org/)

*Thanks github for the hosting and theme*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
